page.title: 02WILDLIFE IN OUR AREA
page.content: On our investigations around our D block we have seen much wildlife or evidence of various creatures and birds. {SALMONHUTCH }- We found a kingfisher's nest and saw a coot or water hen,the fourth year children saw a heron feeding there.There were also holes in the riverbank that we thought might be water rats homes. {POSBURY}- We found jay feathers and a cuckoo's egg in St Francis.Other animals seen were field mouse,grey squirrel,voles,pheasants. {FARMLAND/WOODLAND }- Foxes,badger setts,hare,rabbits,weasel or stoat,squirrels,mole,mice,voles. Birds spotted:- Yellow Hammer, Bullfinch,Goldfinch,Greenfinch,crows,r ooks,blackbirds,Thrush,Great-Tit,Blue- Tits,pigeons,magpies,sparrows,a Buzzard,a Hawk,a Kestrel,a Barn Owl.
